title: THE PUNISHER Season 1 Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Damn, I totally missed the opportunity to call it a CAROUSEL OF BLOOD!
The fact that Frank has said he rather be in blood and guts , than be back with his family is F’d up ...I think he punishes himself over that the most .
Is this the backstory of Shane from Walking Dead?? Neat!

Daddy TS is going to going to take us to school about The Punisher? Yes please and thank you! Bang up job, sir. I just hope Netflix doesn’t shit the bed on season two or worse, cancel it right after it ends. They’ve been “pink slip” happy with the rest of The Defenders characters.
description:
With the new season of Marvel's "The Punisher" on its way I wanted to tale a deep dive into Season 1's ending and hopefully get us all set for season 2!
